name: The Sea
description:
A game I made for my girlfriend during #MagicRealismJam.

The inspiration tweet: https://twitter.com/MagicRealismBot/status/7052989...

Part love letter, part seasickness simulator, The Sea has you control a ship through self reflection. Just keep going forward.

Don't run this in fullscreen

Helper code for 3D text by SimpleHelvetica

Tutorial on how to do boat physics by Habrador

Everything else was made by me
